sentences.english: Bureau of investigation with wide and superior power is set to punish those members of corruption severely.
sentences.chinese: 設立職權廣泛的貪污調查局，重懲腐敗分子。

sentences.english: Don't blaspheme against the name of God, or else you will be punished severely by God.
sentences.chinese: 不要褻瀆上帝的名字，否則你會受到上帝的重懲。
